name: She Looks So Perfect EP (US Tour Edition)

reviews.name: She Looks So Perfect EP (US Tour Edition)
reviews.reviewText:
This EP is the first of 5 Seconds of Summer to be released in America.... and it was definitely worth the wait! 5 Seconds of Summer, an alternative punk band from Australia, is widely known for opening for One Direction on their Take Me Home Tour last year. However, do not let this misguide you. Luke Hemmings, Calum Hood, Michael Clifford, and Ashton Irwin sound nothing like One Direction. Their edgy and catchy songs are sure to soon be a hit and take over America as they have in Australia, UK, Ireland, and many other places.

If you don't get this EP, trust me. You're missing out. This is one of the best EP's I've ever heard.

As said in one of their previous songs [Unpredictable to be exact], they really are "taking on the world."
reviews.title: 5 Seconds of Summer- She Looks So Perfect EP

reviews.name: She Looks So Perfect EP (US Tour Edition)
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my daughter's Easter basket and we haven't stopped listening yet!
reviews.title: Fan fav

reviews.name: She Looks So Perfect EP (US Tour Edition)
reviews.reviewText: There may not be a lot of songs on here but it is a ep so yeah...... This band is really good and its hard to here good music these days and they have it. If you like this I suggest there new album.
